Test Name: Chromosomal Microarray Analysis (CMA) for Prenatal Amniotic Fluid/Chorionic Villus Sampling
Specimen Type: Amniotic fluid or chorionic villus tissue
Purpose: To detect chromosomal abnormalities by identifying copy number variations in prenatal samples.
Container: Sterile container for amniotic fluid or sterile container with culture medium for CVS
Equipment: Genomic DNA extraction kit, microarray platform (e.g., Affymetrix, Agilent, Illumina), hybridization station, microarray scanner, PCR machine
